name: Super Smash Brawl
description:
Super Smash Brawl is an Action online game where each player chooses a character that contains an unique set of skills to battle in an arena to defeat other players.

The game is available for Android and still in Development.

Features:

  • 3 Unique Characters
  • 3 Maps
  • 2 Game Modes with settings (Most kills in X time, First to reach X kills)

    Please answer the survey below to give me feedback about the game
    https://forms.gle/vzbUx8F9J137uY116
